page.title: 08SCHOOL LIFE IN MONIFIETH
page.content:
Stephen writes about a visit from Our Lady's School Dundee We first met Our Lady's at the final of the Road Safety Quiz at Police Head -quarters Dundee.In June they came to visit.We split into teams of ten and had 10 minutes at different games_net- ball-rounders-football-volleyball and beanbag throws.After orange juice and crisps the bus came.Next week we are going to see their open-plan school.
Graeme writes: Interschool Football Final Kinloch Carnoustie and Grange met in the Cup Final at Westfield Park.I was Grange captain.We were beaten 6-2,but it was a good game.I was chosen Man of the Match for Grange.Next day I went round the classes to show my cup to the staff and pupils.My name is to be engraved on it.
